summary: The federal government is on a long-term, unsustainable fiscal path—it is spending more money than it is collecting. We've made hundreds of recommendations through our High Risk list and our work on duplicative, overlapping, and fragmented federal programs that could help the government save tens of billions of dollars. title: Government Efficiency and Effectiveness: Opportunities to Address Pervasive Management Risks and Challenges while Reducing Federal Costs
